author: jgm
content: I wrote a post defining attestation effectiveness, which is a way of understanding how well a validator is doing its duties without needing a deep understanding of rewards: https://www.attestant.io/posts/defining-attestation-effectiveness/

author: barnabemonnot
content:
<@!144468805697929216> Is this the same metric we now see on beaconcha.in? e.g. here https://beaconcha.in/validator/11380

Edit: self-answered, yes it is ^^ https://discordapp.com/channels/595666850260713488/736377302446768179/740856517980586005

author: jgm
content: <@!486501030046203915> yep, we worked with beaconcha.in to help them provide the metric
